/api/data/v6.0/admin/licenses/assign

- assigning/removing license from user that does not exist
- there are not enough unused licenses
- invalid account type, license can be assigned only to users

get.summary: Search for elements in solr

parameters.name: allWords
parameters.description: true-requires to match all the words on the element, false-matching at least one word. Default value is true.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Available values:Rank, Created, Modified. Default value is Rank.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number, used to offset element. Default page is 1.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of elements per page. Default size is 10. Max 200

patch.summary: Updates an instance with the given id. If the Path ID or Guid is specified it moves the instance withe the given path.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Path that will be used by element. Available values are:guid, id or key word 'default'

parameters.name: forceCheckout
parameters.description: When set to '1' and when the user has administrator rights, the checkouts of other users will be terminated and then the operation will be performed

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description:
Optional mode parameter that specifies validation behavior. When empty or standard, all fields will be validated. When set ignoreReadonly, readonly fields won't be set
but no error will be returned. Admin value allows to edit readonly fields, but requires admin permissions.

403.description: Access to the selected workflow instance is denied

405.description: Admin operations require not impersonated application

405.description: Method Not Allowed

/api/data/v6.0/me

get.summary: Search for elements in solr
get.description:
Path (GET)

 /api/data/v6.0/search
At least one permission required:App.Search.Read.All; User.Search.Read.All

parameters.name: allWords
parameters.description: true-requires to match all the words on the element, false-matching at least one word. Default value is true.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Available values:Rank, Created, Modified. Default value is Rank.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number, used to offset element. Default page is 1.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of elements per page. Default size is 10. Max 200

403.description: Forbidden

get.summary: Gets metadata from selected url

4.0.Fields.LinkField.description: Used for HyperLink and ImageLink fields

4.0.Fields.PickerField.description: Used for ChoiceList, ChoicePicker, Autocomplete, ChooseTree and People fields

4.0.Fields.PictureField.description: Used for Picture and HandwrittenSignature fields. Field value is in base64 format

4.0.Fields.TextField.description: Used for SingleLine and Email fields

4.0.ItemLists.PickerCell.description: Used for ChoiceList, ChoicePicker, Autocomplete and ChoiceTree fields

5.0.Fields.LinkField.description: Used for HyperLink and ImageLink fields

5.0.Fields.PickerField.description: Used for ChoiceList, ChoicePicker, Autocomplete, ChooseTree and People fields

5.0.Fields.PictureField.description: Used for Picture and HandwrittenSignature fields. Field value is in base64 format

5.0.Fields.TextField.description: Used for SingleLine and Email fields

5.0.ItemLists.PickerCell.description: Used for ChoiceList, ChoicePicker, Autocomplete and ChoiceTree fields

Bearer.description:
JWT Authorization header using Bearer scheme. Paste token in format Bearer <token>.
Example:Bearer eyJhbGc(..)xBKKg
Bearer.name: Authorization
